mapper.select: SELECT A.* , D.PRDCT_NM , D.PRDCT_INFO , D.PRDCT_PRICE FROM T_SGJ_CART A, ( SELECT B.PRDCT_NM , B.PRDCT_INFO , C.PRDCT_PRICE , B.PRDCT_NO , C.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO FROM T_SGJ_PRDCT B, T_SGJ_PRDCT_DETAIL C WHERE B.PRDCT_NO = C.PRDCT_NO ) D WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.PRDCT_NO = D.PRDCT_NO AND A.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO = D.PRDCT_DETAIL_NO
